details.name: Login Functionality Test
details.description: Verify that users can log in with valid credentials and are prevented from logging in with invalid credentials.

details.name: SQL Injection Vulnerability Test
details.description: Check for vulnerabilities related to SQL injection in all forms and input fields.

details.name: Data Integrity Test
details.description: Ensure that data entered into the system is stored correctly and can be retrieved accurately.

details.name: Load Performance Test
details.description: Test the system's performance under expected and peak load conditions.

details.name: Responsive Design Test
details.description: Check that the application is responsive and displays correctly on various devices and screen sizes.
